Description_lang: The caster is surrounded by globes of water, granting $s2 mana per 5 sec. When a melee attack hits the caster, the caster regains $?s382033[${($382033s5/100+1)*$52128s1}][$52128s1]% of their mana. This effect can only occur once every $?a462454[${$proccooldown+($462454s2/1000)}.1][$proccooldown] sec. $?s383010[The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.][Only one of your Elemental Shields can be active on you at once.]
AuraDescription_lang: Grants $w2 mana per 5 sec.Melee attacks against you trigger additional mana restoration.
